TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceView extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceView

summary.span: 支持 控件并提供一个接口，使数据绑定控件可以执行 LINQ 数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要旨在通过数据绑定控件，而不是页的代码中的可编程对象一起使用。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 页开发人员通常使用控件与数据进行交互。Page developers typically use the control to interact with data. ASP.NET 数据源控件包含一个或多个数据的列表，表示由数据源视图对象。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 类扩展类。The class extends the class. 它定义的功能控件与其关联，且它实现的数据源控件的基本数据功能。It defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 类实现，[更新]()，[插入]()，和[删除]()操作。The class implements the , [Update](), [Insert](), and [Delete]() operations. 它还实现排序、 筛选和管理保留在视图状态的设置。It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 尽管向页面开发人员未直接公开对象，可以通过访问其属性和方法的许多控件。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the control. 控件实现以下数据检索方法和事件，并将它们公开到页开发人员和其他调用方通过关联控件：The control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated control: - 属性。The property. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. 您可以通过在检索数据进行排序控件通过添加`OrderBy`子句。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an `OrderBy` clause. 你可以提供的排序表达式通过设置实例属性对象传递给方法。You can provide a sort expression for the instance by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 语法属性是相同的语法属性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 控件实现接口并使用视图状态在页请求之间跟踪其状态。The control implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 实现属性和， ，和方法用于启用控件的视图状态跟踪。Implementations of the property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: public LinqDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource owner, string name, System.Web.HttpContext context);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource owner, string name, class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed
Public Sub New (owner As LinqDataSource, name As String, context As HttpContext)
public: LinqDataSourceView(System::Web::UI::WebControls::LinqDataSource ^ owner, System::String ^ name, System::Web::HttpContext ^ context);

param.name: owner
param.span: 与 对象关联的数据源控件。

span.span: The data source control that the object is associated with.

param.name: name
param.span: 数据源视图的唯一名称（在拥有它的数据源控件的范围内）。

span.span: A unique name for the data source view within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
The current instance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将指定的 控件设置为当前视图的所有者。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified control as the owner of the current view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由调用[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法以返回具有指定的数据源视图的新实例`name`参数。The constructor is called by the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 只有一个对象与之关联一次的控件。Only one object is associated with a control at a time. 名称对象始终是`DefaultView`，尽管此命名限制强加控制，不通过控件。The name of the object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not by the control. 您可以重写[LinqDataSource.GetView]()方法以支持使用不同的命名约定的视图。You can override the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to support views that use a different naming convention. 通过传递的实例`context`来访问参数集合的数据源视图通过使用参数。The instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanDelete { get; }
.property instance bool CanDelete
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanDelete As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanDelete { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件关联的 对象是否支持删除操作。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the delete operation.

value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`如果属性设置为`true`。The property returns `true` if the property is set to `true`. 但是，删除操作仍失败如果关联的数据属性未设置或未正确设置。However, a delete operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.

value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`如果属性设置为`true`。The property returns `true` if the property is set to `true`. 但是，插入操作仍失败如果关联的数据属性未设置或未正确设置。However, an insert operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanPage { get; }
.property instance bool CanPage
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanPage As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanPage { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件关联的 对象是否支持对检索的数据分页。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging of retrieved data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终支持分页，即使数据呈现控件不使用分页。The object always supports paging even if the data presentation control does not use paging. 当[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()属性设置为`false`，您还可以手动页中的数据事件。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { get; }
.property instance bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRetrieveTotalRowCount As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件相关联的 对象除支持检索数据外，是否还支持检索数据行的总数。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用可分页来确定如何呈现分页控件的行的总数。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 例如，此值用于确定多少数字页导航按钮在呈现控件页导航。For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如果[LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]()属性设置为`false`，你必须手动设置的总行数事件。If the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanSort { get; }
.property instance bool CanSort
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanSort As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanSort { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件相关联的 对象是否支持对检索数据的排序视图。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终支持排序，即使数据呈现控件不使用排序。The object always supports sorting even if data presentation control does not use sorting. 当[LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort]()属性设置为`false`，你可以手动对中的数据进行排序事件。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort]() property is set to `false`, you can manually sort the data in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件来访问释放之前, 的上下文或执行清理该对象被销毁之前即特定于该对象。Handle this event to access the context before disposal, or to perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed.

summary.span: 完成删除操作后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a delete operation has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件来捕获执行删除操作期间引发的异常或删除操作完成之后检查输出参数的值。Handle this event to catch exceptions that were thrown during the delete operation or to examine the values of output parameters after a delete operation has finished. 你可以检索来自的输出参数与事件相关联的对象。You can retrieve the output parameters from the object that is associated with the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当你重写方法在派生类中，请确保你调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When you override the method in a derived class, make sure that you call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void UpdateDataObject (object dataContext, object table, object oldDataObject, object newDataObject);

summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件，以便验证要更新、 更改的值早更新操作，也可以取消更新操作的对象。Handle the event to validate the object to be updated, to change a value before the update operation, or to cancel the update operation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 事件。For more information, see the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的类属性必须派生自顺序来启用自动插入、 更新和删除操作的类。The class that is specified in the property must derive from the class in order to enable automatic insert, update, and delete operations.
